title: The __init__ Function
subtext: A special method in Python Programming Language
author: Buzzpy

description.title: The __init__ Function
texts: The __init__ function is a special method in Python that is called when an object is instantiated. It initializes the object's attributes and sets up the initial state of the object.
It is commonly used to set default values for object properties or to perform setup tasks when creating new instances of a class.
